1.<pc>の 持っている|『超天遊戯－死の書－』が 光り始めた！: The Choten Yugi: Book Four in <pc>'s|possession has begun to glow!

2.白紙だったページに 文字が浮かびあがってくる。|<pc>とヤーンは その文字を読: Text emerges from the blank page.|<pc>, Yarn read.

3.修行も今回で 最後になるからの……。|これで終わりでは ないぞ。: This will be the last time I train, and it|won't be the last.

4.ガタラ原野のどこかにある グルグ地下道。|その奥の部屋の床に 魔獣の左角と|魔獣: Somewhere in the Gatara Fields is the Gulug|Underpass. Stick Beast's Left Horn and Beast's|Right Horn on the floor of the back room.

5.そこで おぬしは 命をかけることになる。|不退転の決意で この修行を果たせ。|途:
There, you will put your life on the line.|Fulfill this training with determination. I|will not allow you to throw it away in the|
|process.

6.「いよいよ 来たな～。| ドワーフの国の ガタラ原野にある洞くつが| 最後の修行: It's finally here! It seems that the cave in|the Gatara Fields in the Land of Dwarves will|be the stage of the final training.

7.「そんじゃ～ はりきって| 修行を 果たしにいくとしようか～。| もちろん オレ: Well then~ let's go and fulfill our training!|Of course, I'll come along too!

8.「命をかけろって 言ってるくらいだからな～。| 何が起こるか わからねえぜ？|: I'm just saying, "Put your life on the line.|You never know what might happen. Make sure|you're prepared~.

9.「安心しろって～！！ なんたって| 今回は このオレが ついてるからな～！: Don't worry~!　After all, I'm with you this|time~!

10.「ここの床に 魔獣の左角と 魔獣の右角を| 突きたてれば いいんだな～。: I guess we just have to stick Beast's Left|Horn and Beast's Right Horn in the floor here.

11.「何が起こるか お楽しみだな。| よし <cs_pchero> 始めるか～？<y: Let's see what happens. Okay <cs_pchero>|let's get started~?<yesno><close>

12.「おいおい。ビビッたのか？| オレが ついてるって言っただろ。| いいから さっ: Oh, come on. You scared? I told you I have|your back. Just get on with it and do it!<yesno><close>

13.<cs_pchero>は 魔獣の左角と 魔獣の右角を|ふたつとも 床に突きたてた: <cs_pchero> both the Beast's Left Horn and|the Beast's Right Horn against the floor...

15.「出やがった 出やがった～！| コイツを倒せってことのようだぜ。: It's out, it's out, it's out! Looks like we're|supposed to take this guy down.

16.「お～っと。アンタが倒さないと| 修行失敗ってことも ありえるな～。: Oops. If you don't beat him, it's possible|that your training will fail.

17.「お手並み拝見と いかせてもらうぜ。| がんばってくれよ <cs_pchero>: Let's see how you do. Good luck|<cs_pchero>~!

19.「<cs_pchero> 今度はイケるよな？| アイツは ヤル気マンマンみたいだ: <cs_pchero> You think he's gonna make it|this time? He looks like he's ready to get|laid.

21.「やるじゃねえか～。ここまでの修行を| こなしてきたチカラは ダテじゃね～な。: You're good, aren't you? You're not so bad|after all the training you've been through.

22.「これで 超天道士の名は| アンタに継がれた……のか？| 死ぬ心配は なくなった: Now you've inherited the name of|"supernaturalist"? You should no longer be|worried about dying, right?

23.「おいおい <cs_pchero>。| アンタ 手を抜いたんじゃね～だろうな？: Hey, hey <cs_pchero>. You didn't cut any|corners, did you?

24.「あ～あ。結局 オレが やっちまったか。| <cs_pchero> 平気か～？|: Ah~ ah. I guess I did it after all.|<cs_pchero> Are you okay? You're not going|to die, are you?

27.「コイツは 不死身の魔物なのか！| だとしたら コレは……マジでヤバいか？: Is he an immortal monster? If so, is this a|serious problem?

28.「その魔物は 強烈なショック状態に| おとさないかぎり 倒すことはできないと|: I've heard from a supernaturalist that this|monster can only be defeated by putting it|into a state of intense shock.

30.「なんとかしないと <cs_pchero>殿は| 本当に 死んでしまうかもしれま: If we don't do something about it,|<cs_pchero> may indeed be dead.

31.「ガウラド～。お前 あの技がなきゃ| コイツを倒せないのを 知ってたんだな。|: Gaurad~! You knew you couldn't beat him|without that technique, didn't you? Did your|grandfather put you up to this?

32.「はあ～。あの技は使いたくないのによ……。| なによりも じ～さんの思うツボって:
I don't want to use that technique... I don't|want to use that technique, but... I don't|like the fact that I'm doing what Mr. Pot|
|wants me to do, but I can't help it~.

33.「それなら 食らえよ！| 超天道士直伝の必殺技！！: Then eat it! The special move of the|Chotenkyoji direct!

35.<cs_pchero>の 持っている|『超天遊戯－死の書－』が 光り始めた！: The Choten Yugi: Book Four in <cs_pchero>'s|possession has begun to glow!

36.「……よくぞ 最後の修行を果たした。| ワシが残せるものは これで すべてじゃ。: Well done on your final training. This is all|I have to leave you.

37.「超天道士の名は おぬしが受け継ぐがいい。| その技と心 そして教えと共に。: You will inherit the name of Chotendo-sensei.|With your skills, your heart, and your|teachings.

38.「新たな超天道士の誕生と 新たな伝説の始まりを| ワシは あの世から見守るとしよ:
I will watch the birth of a new supernatural|being and the beginning of a new legend from|the other world...? You knew you were going to|
|die, didn't you?

40.「これで あなたは| 名実ともに 超天道士の名を| その身に 受け継いだのです！: You have now inherited the name of Chotendo-|sensei, both in name and in reality!

41.「お前 もしかして オレをハメたのか？| <cs_pchero>が死ぬって話も|: Did you set me up, by any chance? <You weren't|lying about the death of <cs_pchero>, were|you?

42.「人聞きが悪いですよ ヤーン様。| 武闘家たる者 死の危険は| いつ いかなると: You are not a man of your word, Master Yarn.|As a martial artist, death is always at hand.

43.「やっちまったものは しかたないな……。| 超天道士の名。もらうだけ もらっとく: I can't help what I've done... the name of|Chotendo-sensei. I'll take it as long as I can|get it.

44.「<cs_pchero>に 超天道士の名を| 継いでもらおうって オレの作戦は失: My plan to have <cs_pchero> take over the|name of the Chosen One has failed. The Book of|Death will be returned as it is.

45.<cs_pchero>は ヤーンに|超天遊戯－死の書－を 返した。: <cs_pchero> returned the Choten Yugi: Book|Four to Yarn.

46.「オレのわがままで アンタを| つきあわせちまって 悪かったな～。: I'm sorry I put you in this situation because|of my own selfishness.

47.「おわびと言っちゃ～アレだが| さっきの技を アンタにも 教えてやるよ。| 武闘: I'm going to teach you the same thing I just|taught you. It's called Roaring Tirade.

49.「たいしたものじゃないが コレを| アンタに 贈らせてもらおう。: It's not much, but I'll give you this.

50.「なあ～ 今度 オレと勝負してくれよ。| アンタとだったら きっと| いい闘いが: Hey~ You should fight me sometime. I'm sure I|can have a good fight with you.

51.「オレも 準備に取りかかるからさ～。| 武闘家になって また オレんとこへ来てく: I'm going to start preparing too. Come back to|me again after you become a martial artist.|See you later <cs_pchero>~.

52.「ついに超天道士の復活が なされた！| どれだけ この時を待ったのか……。: At long last, the Chotendoji has been|resurrected! How long I've waited for this|moment...
